posts.post_title: BOTH SOLD! T206 hof tinker & geo.gibson------BOTH SOLD
posts.post_content:
CLOSED--BOTH SOLD--


Here are my latest pair of offerings from the Roy Mellinger Collection:

HOFer Joe Tinker (Hands on Knees) P150/25--SGC 40 VG 3

WONDERFUL CENTERING, DEFINED CORNERS & SUPER CLEAN F&B. Very SHARP COLOR & CONTRAST. The EYE APPEAL is much nicer than the given Grade!!
$279 plus $5.99 shipping w/ Ins. REDUCED $10 TO $269.00

GEORGE GIBSON P150/25--SGC 30 GOOD 2

This card puzzles me a lot! NO noticeable creases anywhere! (tiny bend upper left corner) Nice SHARP CORNERS & TERRIFIC CENTERING F&B, CRISP yellow BKGRND, COLOR & CONTRAST A-1, CLEAN as can be F&B! 

WHY the grade of 2??---it appears as a 6!!
$69 plus $3.99 ship padded. REDUCED $10 TO $59.00

Use PPal F & F or mail check or MO. First "I'll take it" gets the PM/EM.

As w/ just about EVERY Mellinger card, the EYE APPEAL is way over the technical grade given by a wide margin! You'll be proud to have either of these 2 in your Fine Collection!
